title: Plantation With Bungalow for Sale near Galle (50 Acres)
details:
With a small stream flowing through the property in to an irrigation tank this large mixed crop estate offers primarily coconut palms, rubber trees, and cinnamon. The derelict but recently built bungalow is in need of renovation however the structure and roof are practically new. This property is surrounded by rubber estates and offers beautiful elevated paddy views. Conveniently located 20min drive to the town of Weligama and its large sweeping sandy bay which attracts swimmers as well as long board surfers. Only 10 min from Southern Expressway that takes you to Galle Fort within 10mins and Colombo within one hour maximum.

This plantation generates an income in excess of USD6,000 per month.
